content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron/Copper Smelting Area (around position 0,0)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position (0,0)
- Stone furnace at position (2,0) 
- Stone furnace at position (4,4)
All furnaces currently have coal fuel but no ingredients to smelt

###Electronic Circuit Production Line (around position 9,11)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at position (6.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at position (7.5,11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine 1 at position (9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position (11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at position (12.5,11.5) storing finished electronic circuits

###Power Generation System (around position -7,24)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5,24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at position (-7.0,24.5)
- Steam pipe network 
- Steam engine at position (-2.5,24.5)
- Connected electrical pole network powering the factory

###Science Lab Setup (around position 0,28)
Consists of:
- Lab at position (0.5,28.5)
- Burner inserter at position (0.5,30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at position (0.5,31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Prerequisite Errors
- Research technologies in correct order following prerequisite chains:
  - Need modules research before productivity-module
  - Need lubricant before electric-engine
  - Need chemical-science-pack before advanced-material-processing-2
  - Need advanced-electronics before chemical-science-pack
  - Need plastics before advanced-electronics
  - Need oil-processing before plastics
  - Need fluid-handling before oil-processing
  - Need engine before fluid-handling

### Technology Already Researched Errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research:
  - advanced-material-processing
  - military
  - logistics-2

### Invalid Technology Name Errors
- Use correct technology names from the Technology enum:
  - "EngineUnit" and "Engine" are not valid technology names

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Ensure sufficient fuel (coal) is available before attempting to insert into boilers
- Electronic circuit assembly requires iron plates and copper cables as ingredients
